title: Mahoutsukai Syd & Lid
sinopse:
From Storm in Heaven:

Magicians, people with magical powers that have caused their kind to be hated and feared throughout the centuries. This manga contains their tales -- of magic for both good and evil, the struggle to fit into society, and a dark past that haunts them both.

The series includes:

1. Romanesque Variee
2. Mystic Variee
3. Classical Variee
4. Sweet Variee
5. Silouette Variee
6. Crescent Variee
7. Secret Variee
8. Fantastic Variee
9. Nostalgic Variee
